channel.title: Can't connect
channel.description:
Hello I have got my server from an open source, and I have tried two different servers, and I have tried mopar client web and download, and I have tried other clients. Everytime I get on my server it says this:
online Connection from localhost:2720 Maninthemirr: character file not found. ClientHandler: Client Maninthemirr disconnected (localhost)
(Maninthemirr would be my name) and it dc's me right as I get on, any suggestions?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 20, 2009, 06:28:50 pm[/size][hr]bump[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 20, 2009, 06:56:57 pm[/size][hr]can someone plese help me
